roleset.name: formation of minerals via microorganisms

role.descr: chemical compound/biproduct produced by microorganism that is responsible for the biomineralization

example.name: biomineralize-v: bovine serum albumin
example.text: Silver nanoclusters emitting weak NIR fluorescence were biomineralized by BSA.
example.arg: Silver nanoclusters emitting weak NIR fluorescence

example.name: biomineralization-n
example.text: In the biomineralization of the mollusc shell, specialized proteins are responsible for directing crystal nucleation, phase, morphology, and growths dynamics and ultimately give the shell its remarkable mechanical strength.

roleset.note: BIOMINERALIZE-V, BIOMINERALIZATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia for cleareart-biotexts.
